title: Casino Critique
author: Casino Critique
content: A signed copy of this promotion is available here: https://ibco.casinocritique.com/promotion-signed-file.txtPlease join our Telegram Chat for regular update: https://t.me/CasinoCritiqueChatPS:You do not need to post anything in the reply of this topic.More promotion will be available on our promotion page: https://ibco.casinocritique.com/promotions/

comments.author: PLayerZero14
comments.body: You stated on your website that this contest will end when the hardcap is reached; do you have an estimate of how long this will take? and what if you never reach the hard cap? Does this mean that the promo will never end ?

comments.author: Casino Critique
comments.body: Quote from: PLayerZero14 on August 22, 2022, 06:05:30 PMYou stated on your website that this contest will end when the hardcap is reached; do you have an estimate of how long this will take? and what if you never reach the hard cap? Does this mean that the promo will never end ?We said it's hardcap, we expect to reach it. However, this promotion will be paid even if we are able to reach Softcap. It's not much money to giveaway.More details are available on our IBCO website: https://ibco.casinocritique.com/Thanks for your interest.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: It's strange that so few more people follow your Twitter, usually users willingly respond to actions of this kind, here almost nothing has changed in four days after the tweet, I hope that it will gain momentum.
